alert.note: Alert for Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 5:27PM EST until January 10 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maryland... Conococheague Creek at Fairview affecting Washington County. For the Conococheague Creek...including Fairview...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Conococheague Creek at Fairview. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Wishard Road and Kemp Mill Road are both flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 4.5 feet, or 5.5 feet below flood stage. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 10.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.1 feet on 04/15/1970. - Please visit weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Wed Wed Wed Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1AM 7AM 1PM Stg Time Date Conococheague Creek Fairview 10.0 4.5 Tue 4 pm 7.7 9.4 10.1 10.1 1pm Wed &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/washington or weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 530 AM EST.
